title: Phase 2.3: Ownership resolution
description: Multi-source ownership attribution for services. Sources: PagerDuty escalation policies, GitHub CODEOWNERS parsing, Backstage owner field, Kubernetes labels/annotations. Confidence scoring and conflict resolution. Optional dependencies: pdpyras>=5.2.0 (PagerDuty), PyGithub>=2.1.0 (CODEOWNERS). Files to create: src/nthlayer/identity/ownership.py, ownership_providers/*.py, cli/ownership.py. CLI: nthlayer ownership <service.yaml>.
